item.title: Data Wrangling with dplyr - Part 2
item.description: Introduction In the previous post, we learnt about dplyr verbs and used them to compute average order value for an online retail company data. In this post, we will learn to combine tables using different *_join functions provided in dplyr. Libraries, Code & Data We will use the following packages: dplyr readr The data sets can be downloaded from here and the codes from here. library(dplyr) library(readr) options(tibble.
